title: Breaking down the problem
text: Right now, we have a function where f(x) is the output and $$x$$ is the input. We want to create a new function where our old inputs are out new outputs and vice versa.

title: So what do we do?
text: We do this by switching our $$x$$ and f(x) (or y), and then solving for the new $$y$$ term.
